meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Accumulate</kanji> enough of a good reputation at your company in <kanji>advance</kanji> and you'll be able to have <vocabulary>successive promotion</vocabulary>s. You'll be boss in no time!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
